snippet: Weakness in its core investment banking business caused the Swiss bank to report its first quarterly loss in three years, despite beginning a cost-cutting effort last year.
abstract: Weakness in its core investment banking business caused the Swiss bank to report its first quarterly loss in three years, despite beginning a cost-cutting effort last year.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Swings to Loss in Fourth Quarter
headline.print_headline: Credit Suisse Posted Quarterly Loss, Its First in 3 Years
